We're specialists in what we sell. Our staff includes graduates from Ohio State (B.S. Horticulture) & Purdue University (M. S. Horticulture). We have over 60 years of combined hands-on experience in ponds & water gardens. Water Gardening is our single, primary business. We practice what we preach. We maintained over 15 different display ponds and water features at our brick and mortar store for over 2 decades with the same products we sell online today. Ranging from small bubbling fountains to 10,000 gallon ponds with complete assortments of plants & fish.. We have hands-on experience with nearly every product we sell. All of our featured products represent a great value, often at or near wholesale. We are here for the long run and stand by our products. From Our Blog What Filter Media is Best for Your Pond? Posted Date: Apr 25th 2023 Pond biological filtration media is an essential component of any pond system. It is responsible

There are no obvious signs of scam characteristics such as unusually low prices, unrealistic money claims, or psychologically manipulative texts. thought: The WHOIS data shows that the domain pondandgardendepot.com was created in 2007 and has a good standing with domain status indicators such as 'clientTransferProhibited', which is typical for legitimate domains. The use of a privacy service (Domains By Proxy, LLC) is common for businesses to protect their privacy. The domain information does not raise any red flags and aligns with a legitimate and established business. Given the positive customer reviews, the presence of a physical store, the detailed and relevant content on the website, and the credible domain information, I am inclined to believe that this is not a scam website. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.pondandgardendepot.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has a long-standing domain history detailed product descriptions and a physical store presence which all indicate a legitimate business operation rather than a scam.
